metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0675 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: In certain situations it is possible for an unmanaged rule to exist on thetarget system that has the same comment as the rule specified in themanifest. This could allow for unmanaged rules to exist on the targetsystem and leave the system in an unsafe state.

criterions.comment: puppet-module-puppetlabs-firewall: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
